title: What is the best app to learn lot of things? - Quora

response.answer_text: Coursera is one of the best option to get online education for free. Khan Academy is another free platform to learn new things. TED Talks is another android app to explore knowledge. Mathway: Mathway solves all type of problems in Basic Math, Pre-Algebra, Algebra, Trigonometry, calculus, Calculus, Statistics, Finite Math, Linear Algebra, and Chemistry.Receiving answers on Mathway is completely free, but step-by-step solutions require payment.Star Chart:Star chart is one of the amazing android app for people who like astrology and space. With this app you see any star location in space with name. You can also see exact location of earth in space from virtual program. Download this app for increase your knowledge about space and astrology.Udemy: Udemy is one of the greatest place for learn anything from internet. Here you find video tutorials for learn anything from mobile like and computer languages, video editing, making android app, photography and lots of more. You can also Lynda app for finding best video tutorials on lots of topic.Duolingo:Want to learn English, French , Spanish and other languages in mobile. Download duolingo android app for learning english and any language in android mobile.Learn Programming: Learn 30+ Programming Languages  Angular, Asp.net, C++, CSS, CSS2, CSS3, HTML5, Java, Javascript, jQuery, JSP, Lua, Perl, Php, Python, Ruby, SQL, SVG, VBScript, XSL-Fo, XSL and lots of other from this app. You can learn various langauge from step by step with great examples from this android app.

Ther are quite a number of apps for learning a new skill or concept. I would like to post a few:-1) khan academy: this is a brilliant app if you want to learn or explore a new subject. The topics are vast and range from biology to chemistry to music to cryptology. The fields are vast. I highly recommend this application 2) coursera:- coursera is a mooc and provides free online courses for various of topics. You can check it out to have a better idea  3) curiosity - this is an app where you can explore different fields. However some of the videos are paid 4) code academy :- this is a site if you are interested in computer programming  5) yousician : this is a wonderful app if you want to learn about music  6) ear wizard : this is another wonderful app to train your ear musically  7) iTunes U: this is another application for Apple devices which provides free courses from all across the world.  8) quora: this is one of the best apps I've encountered and always helps me in exploring new fields :D  Cheers !
